projects.name: JMart (jmart.kz)
projects.stack: React, TypeScript, Redux (Toolkit, Saga, Reselect), Styled-Components, Webpack, Microbundle, Node (Express)
highlights: Developed and maintained REST API wrapper (pyatka-sdk)
Improved Lighthouse performance and search engine optimization (SEO)
Maintained and developed own SSR on express
Added code-spliting and reduced size of JS bundle

projects.name: 1. Electronic Document Management (EDM) System
highlights: Developed EDS feature (signing e-documents with face biometrics).
Refactored legacy code. Migrated deprecated UI library to new one. Updated dependencies.
Digitized and automated paper-based business processes.

projects.name: 2. Alpha Space (Enterprise Portal / Intranet)
projects.stack: React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, React Query, Tailwind CSS
highlights: Developed admin panel for news, banners creation with Editor.js.

projects.name: DAR Management System (DMS)
projects.stack: React, Next.js, Redux Saga, Nivo charts, Jest, React Testing Library, Material UI
highlights: Developed researcher tool that analyzes competitors' by social media, websites, apps, etc. (integration with Rival IQ, SimilarWeb)
Developed ad-manager tool (managing Google, Facebook ads)
Wrote unit test with Jest and React Testing Library.

projects.name: MeetApp
projects.stack: React, Angular, Nest.js, TypeORM, MySQL, Ant.Design
highlights: Developed app for offline meetings with React, Angular, Nest.js, TypeORM, Redux, Ant.Design

awards.title: Hackathon 2 place
awards.summary: Project: Co-painting with friends on canvas (Socket.IO, Express, p5.JS)

projects.name: Cartoon Beta
projects.summary: IMDB clone for cartoons, anime, etc. Uses TheMovieDB API (20k+ cartoons) and VK API (for news).
